title: Police disperse anti-Gaza war protest in Arab-Israeli city with stun grenades, arrest four
description: Police claimed that protesters chanted slogans which they said constituted incitement, and held signs that could 'disrupt public order.' A protester described the police as using excessive force during the arrests: 'The officers didn't wait for chants or clashes; they just decided to end the protest by force'
author: Deiaa Haj Yahia

title: Amsterdam city council votes to bar Israeli sports teams, citing 'racist and extremist views'
description: Leader of left-wing Denk party, which submitted the proposal, said that Maccabi Tel Aviv would be included in the ban, since its fans 'support genocide, which is reason enough'
author: Haaretz Sports Staff

title: UN-appointed panel calls for Israel to be thrown out of world soccer over Gaza 'genocide'
description: Team of experts, including Francesca Albanese, urges FIFA and UEFA 'to take every measure possible to end the genocide in Gaza'
author: Haaretz Sports Staff

title: Netanyahu before departing for UN, Trump meeting: 'There will be no Palestinian state'
author: Haaretz

title: Israel targets Gaza aid flotilla with drones and explosions, activists say
description: Israel previously said that the activists' refusal to unload the aid in the southern port city of Ashkelon 'once again highlights the insincerity of the flotilla members and their mission to serve Hamas, rather than the people in Gaza,' referring to it as 'the Hamas flotilla'
author: Nir Hasson

title: Trump talks Gaza war with Arab and Muslim leaders on sidelines of UN General Assembly
description: The meeting, which lasted nearly an hour, was viewed as an opportunity for Arab and Muslim leaders to collectively influence Trump's stance on the Gaza war. Several leaders, including Trump, raised their hands to signal the session had been positive
author: Liza Rozovsky

title: 'Oct. 7 as a means of intimidation': Hostage's son says Netanyahu using hostages to establish dictatorship in Israel
description: Boaz Zalmanovich's father, Arye, was abducted into Gaza during the Oct. 7 Hamas attack and murdered in captivity. Boaz describes the Netanyahu government policies that have left hostages to die as 'a moral and ethical rupture' that is deepening the crisis in Israeli society
author: Adi Hashmonai

title: At least 20 Palestinians, including children, reportedly killed in IDF strike on Gaza City building
description: According to Gaza medical sources, at least 73 people have been killed in Israeli attacks since midnight. Hamas said that displaced residents are returning due to the lack of basic services in southern Gaza and accused Israel of misleading the population
author: Jack Khoury

title: Syria and Israel close to 'de-escalation' agreement, U.S. envoy says
description: U.S. Special Envoy for Syria Tom Barrack said the agreement would serve as the first step towards a security deal with Israel. Talks between Syrian and Israeli officials are taking place amid IDF strikes and reported ground operations in southern Syrian territory
author: Haaretz

title: IDF fatally shoots Palestinian man in West Bank, says he threw explosives at troops
description: Ahmed Barahmeh's killing marks the second Palestinian fatality in the West Bank in 12 hours. Separately, the IDF announced it was conducting searches in the Tulkarm area after a rocket was discovered and disabled by a bomb squad
author: Yaniv Kubovich

title: G7 foreign ministers call for 'flood of humanitarian aid' into Gaza, urge Israel and Hamas to reach cease-fire
description: The seven countries, including the U.S. and France, called to end the 'immense suffering of civilians in Gaza through a flood of humanitarian aid and securing the release of all hostages,' in a statement at the UN General Assembly. They also lauded the EU snapback mechanism on Iran's nuclear program
author: Haaretz

title: Isolated as ever, Netanyahu will try to persuade Trump to hold out for victory in Gaza
description: The UN General Assembly debunked Netanyahu's big lie and showed that contrary to his claim, Arab states, the U.S., and other Western countries all want Hamas removed from power. Trump must now decide which path will achieve this faster – a deal imposed on Israel or the conquest of Gaza City
author: Chaim Levinson

title: Top Israeli official overseeing West Bank land removed after disputes with Smotrich allies
description: Tomer Carmi, who oversaw land registration in Area C, faced growing political interference following the establishment of Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich's Settlement Administration until he was ousted earlier this month. A key dispute centered on flaws in a JNF land purchase in the settlement of Elazar
author: Hagar Shezaf

title: Syria's al-Sharaa at UN: 'Committed to dialogue despite Israeli aggression'
description: On the second day of the General Assembly, the Iranian president labeled looming Western 'snapback' sanctions on his country as 'unlawful'. Syria's president also addressed the body, marking the first speech by a Syrian leader to the Assembly since 1967
author: Liza Rozovsky

title: Drone from Yemen crashes in Eilat, southern Israel; 22 wounded, including two seriously
description: Two attempts to intercept the drone failed, and the IDF said rescue forces were operating at the scene, a tourist area. 'Teams on the ground are reporting damage on a scale we are not normally used to seeing,' said the head of Israel's emergency services
author: Eden Solomon

title: Danish pension fund excludes Israeli state assets over Gaza war, West Bank settlements
description: AkademikerPension's divestment 'comes as an assessment of the state of Israel's ability to uphold human rights,' after Norway's sovereign wealth fund pulled Israeli investments and Denmark's prime minister vowed to leverage EU Council presidency for sanctions on Israeli settlers and officials
author: Reuters

title: Tel Aviv-bound flight from Dubai lands in Saudi Arabia after medical incident
description: A Flydubai flight from the UAE changed course and landed in Riyadh after an Israeli passenger apparently suffered a stroke and was taken to a local hospital
author: Daniel Schmil

title: Photo of hostage Alon Ohel published from Hamas captivity video: 'He's blind in one eye'
description: This is the second visual confirmation of Ohel in captivity, with his family permitting only the release of a still image from the video aired by Hamas on Monday. Ohel, 23, was kidnapped from the Nova Music Festival on October 7, 2023
author: Bar Peleg

title: Trump promises Arab leaders he won't allow Israel to annex West Bank, official says
description: U.S. Mideast envoy Steve Witkoff said he is 'hopeful and even confident' that a breakthrough on Gaza could be announced in the coming days, adding that some leaders have already been briefed on Trump's '21-point plan for peace in the Middle East and Gaza'
author: Liza Rozovsky

title: The international recognition Israel should really fear
description: International recognition of Palestine changes little. But if it provokes annexation, it will expose the failure of the two-state vision – leaving Israel isolated
author: Amir Tibon

description: Iran has no intention to build nuclear weapons, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian told the U.N. General Assembly on Wednesday, just...

title: Trump slams Palestinian state recognitions, calls to ‘release the hostages now’

title: Trump meets with Arab, Muslim leaders on sidelines of the UNGA

title: Rubio: Palestinian state recognitions derailed hostage talks

title: A drunken UN rewards Hamas, punishes Israel
description: Recognition of Palestinian statehood emboldens terrorists and prolongs the captivity for Israeli innocents still languishing in Gaza. The post A drunken UN rewards Hamas, punishes Israel appeared first on JNS.org .
author: Fiamma Nirenstein

title: Two-State Delusions
description: Emmanuel Macron, Keir Starmer and the other Western leaders who made this proposal know that calling for a Palestinian state has as much likelihood of success as proposing a U.N. mission to Jupiter. The post Two-State Delusions appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Dan Schnur

title: The Oys of Yiddish
description: One reason my wife and I never learned Yiddish was that our families didn’t want us to. Yiddish was only spoken when they tried to hide things from us. The post The Oys of Yiddish appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Mark Schiff

title: Jonah, the Dovish Divine
description: Despite a year full of distance, imperfections, disappointment, perhaps even betrayal of our very nature, on Yom Kippur we are all doves, possessing the ability to, in the end, return home. The post Jonah, the Dovish Divine appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Rabbi Dr. Stuart Halpern

title: The Big Sorry: Atoning All Year
description: Guilt, despite its bad name, is actually good for me. Like regret and remorse and shame over my wrongdoings, guilt can be instructive and downright motivational. The post The Big Sorry: Atoning All Year appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Bob Brody

title: Recognition Sans Reality: How and Why the West Capitulates to Hamas
description: A political entity that lacks unified governance, defined and controlled territory and a commitment to peace remains something other than a state. To pretend otherwise is not compassion. It is dangerous negligence. The post Recognition Sans Reality: How and Why the West Capitulates to Hamas appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Peter Himmelman

title: Investing in Israel is No Longer About Charity
description: Investing in Israel offers not only the potential to generate wealth but also to redefine what we mean by philanthropy—all while supporting the Jewish people. The post Investing in Israel is No Longer About Charity appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Monica Osborne

title: Our Sacred Promise
description: Founded by Lihie Gilhar in November 2023, Bring Them Light seeks to preserve not just the memory of those we lost, but their faces, their names and their life stories. The post Our Sacred Promise appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Karen Lehrman Bloch

title: On These High Holy Days, Rabbis Must Restore Jews’ Faith in Israel
description: The High Holy Days represent an opportunity to challenge the prevailing narrative and educate our congregants, to restore faith in the Jewish people and Israel. The post On These High Holy Days, Rabbis Must Restore Jews’ Faith in Israel appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Rabbi Stuart Weinblatt

title: Living as Jews in Latin America After Oct. 7
description: Much like in other parts of the world, most of those who criticize Israel in Latin America have little or no grasp of the realities on the ground, yet they readily join the chorus of demonization. The post Living as Jews in Latin America After Oct. 7 appeared first on Jewish Journal .
author: Eduardo Kohn and Adriana Camisar

title: How Not to Respond to the Charlie Kirk Memorial Service
description: Most Jews don’t understand what is taking shape in Christian America. They fear it, conflate its diverse voices and want to denounce it with great moral force, as if that will somehow make it all go away. The post How Not to Respond to the Charlie Kirk Memorial Service appeared first on Jewish Journal .

author: Deborah Danan

title: Hamas: Expansion of IDF's combat in Gaza City means no hostage will be returned
author: Haaretz

title: Until Trump wakes up to Netanyahu's lies about ending the Gaza war - nothing will change
description: The operation to capture Gaza City has made the Israeli prime minister more arrogant than ever, while his partners are cooking up real estate deals. Unless something changes, Israel will also mark three years of war under Netanyahu
author: Chaim Levinson

title: Three brothers from Bedouin town in southern Israel shot dead
description: The three brothers were killed during an arms deal that went awry, a police source said ■ 183 homicides have been recorded in Israel's Arab community during 2025
author: Eden Solomon

title: U.S. immigration judge orders deportation of pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil
description: Khalil's lawyers said they plan to appeal the decision, adding that another court's decision remains in effect and prohibits his deportation
author: Etan Nechin

title: Bernie Sanders becomes first U.S. senator to call Israel's actions in Gaza 'genocide'
description: The Vermont senator has recently sponsored two Senate resolutions to block arms sales to Israel, both of which were rejected in July. 'Israel has not simply defended itself against Hamas, it has waged an all-out war against the Palestinian people,' he wrote
author: Ben Samuels

title: Israeli court acquits woman charged with assaulting Israeli environment minister Idit Silman
description: The judge said Silman's inconsistent testimony was the sole evidence, criticized police for a rushed investigation and ruled that the defendant's actions did not constitute assault or threats
author: Josh Breiner

title: Israeli actor, playwright detained on incitement charges for posting poem on Facebook
description: Ariel Bronz, an Israeli actor known for his performance in the film 'Yes,' was detained by the Israeli police on Wednesday morning for a months-old Facebook post featuring 'a satirical, playful poem that presents a distorted reality in which one prime minister is violently replaced by another'
author: Josh Breiner

title: Dozens of career officers seek early retirement from IDF, senior staff official warns
description: At a hearing on the conscription of ultra-Orthodox men, the IDF Manpower Directorate director warned that the Israeli army is in dire need of new recruits, and that the Israeli government should focus on enlisting Haredim, not arresting them
author: Noa Shpigel

title: Gaza war pushes more Jewish Israeli students toward religion, not away, study finds
description: Undertaken by Hebrew University researchers, the study – published in the International Journal for the Psychology of Religion – also revealed that Jewish Israelis directly impacted by the war were more likely to deepen their beliefs
author: Judy Maltz

title: 'As a friend of Netanyahu, I said a year ago: we must bring the hostages home'
description: Dimona Mayor Benny Biton, a close friend of hostage Segev Kalfon's family, is a well-known veteran member of the Likud party. Unlike most members of his party, he believes that bringing the hostage home is the most important goal of the war in Gaza
author: Eden Solomon

title: Israeli soldiers' vulnerability is a healthy reaction from people who have committed horrific acts
description: Soldiers serving in Gaza and suffering from a 'moral injury' are crying over something obvious: People weren't born to flatten cities and use sophisticated technology to bomb a tent full of displaced people
author: Amira Hass

title: Kazakhstan's Kairat Almaty writes a soccer fairy tale in the Champions League – with an Israeli twist
description: Kairat Almaty, a Kazakh club that nearly collapsed a decade ago, will make its debut in the Champions League with two Israeli players at its core
author: Uzi Dann

title: Eric Cantona, former Man Utd and France star, calls on FIFA and UEFA to suspend Israeli clubs
description: Speaking at the 'Together for Palestine' benefit in London, the retired soccer player pondered why there's a 'double standard,' citing the decision to suspend Russia days after the invasion of Ukraine
author: Haaretz Sports Staff

title: Amid Gaza's extermination and Netanyahu's rule, these leaders still have hope for democracy and Israel
description: It is no wonder that Jewish Israelis and Americans are so exhausted after years of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's leadership and the Gaza war. At Haaretz's conference this week, I saw who can take us forward
author: Margo Hughes-Robinson

title: No privacy, hygiene or security: Palestinian women in Gaza are displaced once again
description: While all Palestinians in Gaza City face hardship, women carry additional burdens, which only intensify as destruction spreads and the IDF advances. 'The word "displaced" does not describe what we're going through,' says one female resident. 'I wouldn't wish this on the Jews'
author: Rawan Suleiman

title: Israel demolishes Palestinian village attacked by settlers in West Bank
description: Bulldozers arrived in the village of Khalet al-Daba in the southern West Bank, demolishing the remaining buildings and infrastructure, as well as the house of a Palestinian resident who was stabbed in a violent settler raid
author: Matan Golan

title: At New Orleans' famous Preservation Hall, Jewish values are instrumental
description: Ben Jaffe's parents opened Preservation Hall in 1961 as a rare pocket of desegregation in the American South – a choice guided by their 'deep connection to Judaism.' Today, Ben is following in his father's footsteps by bringing New Orleans jazz to the next generation
author: Rachel Fink

title: Two Israeli soldiers killed in shooting attack at Jordan border crossing
description: Lt. Col. (res.) Yitzhak Harosh of the Civil Administration and Sgt. Oran Hershko of the Liaison Unit to foreign forces were killed at the Allenby crossing at the Israel-Jordan border. The IDF said a Jordanian driver of a Gaza-bound aid truck shot and stabbed them before being captured by Israeli forces
author: Yaniv Kubovich

title: Released Israeli hostage: 'Netanyahu gave the order to bomb the hostages'
description: Ilana Gritzewsky, who was released in a November 2023 hostage deal, denounced the Israeli government's decision to expand the fighting in Gaza, and called on the Israeli public to join the hostage families in their continuous protest in Jerusalem
author: Haaretz

title: Attorney General Baharav-Miara: Elected officials refusing court orders shatters democracy
description: Attorney General Gali Baharav-Miara spoke at the retirement ceremony of Supreme Court Justice Yosef Elron, warning of 'repeated attempts to harm judicial independence,' including 'personal delegitimization of judges' and 'executive branch officials declaring they will not abide by court orders'
author: Chen Maanit

title: 'Impossible to remain indifferent to the suffering in Gaza,' says Israeli conductor Lahav Shani
description: Shani, whose Munich Philharmonic concert was canceled by organizers of a Belgian festival who questioned 'his position on the genocidal regime in Tel Aviv,' also affirms his pledge to peacemaking and thanks the support he's receiving from Germany and beyond
author: Shay Ringel

title: An Israeli judge frees a settler who killed a Palestinian for no reason. It's the common practice
description: The entire system has always defended Jewish Israelis suspected of murdering Palestinians or Arab Israelis
author: Ariel Livneh

title: Israel breached U.S. defense systems in Qatar. It could mean trouble for American arms sales
description: The Israeli strike on Doha has left Qatar facing the question of why it has been paying so much money for American air defense, which costs billions and failed to get the job done at the moment of truth
author: Hagai Amit

title: IDF names four soldiers killed in battle in the southern Gaza Strip
description: The IDF announced the death of a company commander and three officers in training: Maj. Omri Chai Ben Moshe, Lt. Ron Arieli, Lt. Eitan Avner Ben Itzhak and Lt. Eran Shalem. Three other soldiers were wounded in the incident in southern Gaza's Rafah
author: Yaniv Kubovich

title: American victims of October 7 and their families sue Hamas, Iran and others for billions of dollars
description: The Anti-Defamation League has filed a federal suit against Hamas, half a dozen other terrorist groups and their alleged state sponsors on behalf of over 140 U.S. citizens who were wounded, killed or lost loved ones that day: 'The victims of the October 7 massacre deserve justice'
author: Judy Maltz

title: Drone launched from Yemen hit yard of hotel in southern Israel's city of Eilat
description: According to the police, no one was wounded in the incident, and the surrounding area has been closed for public access as authorities probe the hit ■ The IDF intercepted another drone and a missile launched from Yemen hours after the drone hit in Eilat
author: Yaniv Kubovich

title: IDF officer who planned trip to Lebanese fortress may be charged over deaths of Israeli civilian and soldier
description: The military announced it will indict Yoav Yarom, an IDF officer and artifact collector, for launching an operation in Lebanon to scout an ancient fortress. A shootout with Hezbollah on the trip left a conscript soldier and a far-right scholar dead
author: Bar Peleg

title: Over 400 international artists sign a petition to remove their songs from platforms in Israel
description: Massive Attack, Primal Scream, Japanese Breakfast and King Krule are among the artists who have joined an Israel boycott initiative 'in response to the genocide in Gaza.' The organizers have called on major labels to join, just as they blocked Russia following its invasion of Ukraine
author: Shay Ringel

title: The original Butt-Head: Dome-headed dinosaurs reached sexual maturity before their bodies finished growing
description: They went through that adventure just like we do, and they probably behaved just as badly. We're talking, of course, about the puberty process in the teenage pachycephalosaur
author: Ruth Schuster

title: 'They told me: You're murdering people by day, serving tomatoes by night'
description: Once the toast of the culinary world, Israeli cuisine is now radioactive, with restaurants closing, projects canceled and chefs boycotted abroad. 'We created something impressive, but it seems doomed to become another victim of the war,' as cookbook writer Janna Gur put it
author: Gali Volotsky

title: Likud minister yelled at police officers and cut her mother's police questioning short, law enforcement source says
description: Social Equality Minister May Golan wheeled her mother out of a Tel Aviv police station, after the latter – summoned for suspected involvement in fraud and embezzlement – kept silent for around two hours of interrogation, a police source said. The minister denied the claims
author: Josh Breiner

title: Trump says he wants all hostages released, but won't do the one thing that can save them
description: There's nothing the Israeli hostages' families want to see more than Trump forcing Netanyahu to stop the war and save their loved ones. At this point, Hamas' existence in post-war Gaza isn't the main obstacle to a cease-fire agreement – it's Trump's respect for the prime minister

title: Netanyahu's Charlie Kirk video exposes the cynicism of the Israeli-MAGA alliance
